name: Bioc2014
tagline: Afternoon practical at BioC2014 (31 July): Differential gene- and exon-level expression analyses for RNA-seq data using edgeR, voom and featureCounts
body:
BioC2014
========

Afternoon workshop at BioC2014 using edgeR, voom and featureCounts for gene- and exon-level DE analysis for RNA-seq data


[download first test dataset here](https://github.com/robinsonlabuzh/BioC2014/countsR.Rdata)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
